rows.label: qev013104_MSG0001
rows.name:
All right! I give up! I've been sitting around
this hole too long when I should have been
practicing my tactics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_JNK0010
rows.name: Insist

rows.label: qev013104_SEL0011
rows.name: Demand the white gold in exchange for Briggs's life.

rows.label: qev013104_JNK0020
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev013104_SEL0021
rows.name: Question Briggs to see if he is hiding anything more.

rows.label: qev013104_JNK0030
rows.name: Execute

rows.label: qev013104_SEL0031
rows.name: Kill Briggs without further discussion.

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0002
rows.name: So that's what you're after...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0003
rows.name: Fine. Here. It's the key to the safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0004
rows.name:
I never thought Fosdyke and Moorehouse would
stab me in the back like this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0005
rows.name:
Guess a teammate's promise isn't worth what
I thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0006
rows.name: Please, let me share the truth before I die![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0007
rows.name:
What did Fosdyke and Moorehouse tell you?
That I was hoarding the white gold for myself?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0008
rows.name:
Look at me. I lost my job as a BLADE.
I live in this hovel while Fosdyke and Moorehouse
are comfortable in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0009
rows.name:
They live normal lives while I stay here day after
day guarding this damnable white gold![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0010
rows.name:
And it's not even mine! It's THEIR gold!
They're forcing me to be here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0011
rows.name: Please, you've got to set me free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_JNK0040
rows.name: Trust

rows.label: qev013104_SEL0041
rows.name: Believe Briggs.

rows.label: qev013104_JNK0050
rows.name: Distrust

rows.label: qev013104_SEL0051
rows.name: Don't believe Briggs.

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0013
rows.name: Thank you! Whew, what a comeback save...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0014
rows.name:
Here—take the key to the safe and get that
white gold far away from me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0015
rows.name: You believe those backstabbers over me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0016
rows.name:
Then here! Open the safe and have a look at the
white gold for yourself. That should be proof enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0017
rows.name: Here's the key. It's yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0018
rows.name: No, wait! Don't I get—WAAAAAUGH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0019
rows.name: ...Nnngh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0020
rows.name:
Want the...white gold that bad, huh? Fine...
T-take the damn key... Go have a look at...the truth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0021
rows.name:
I won't miss this life... All been wrecked by...
other folks' greed anyway...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013104_MSG0022
rows.name: Go on, open the safe. That key will get you in.[ST:wait ]
